activities.name: SP_Upsert_VigieCtrl
activities.description: Update les resultats du WebActivity surtout le rowcount et le Start en End TS

scripts.text:
UPDATE v
SET
    v.bronze_rows  = c.row_count,
    v.bronze_delta = c.row_count - v.expected_rows,
    v.bronze_status =
        CASE
            WHEN c.row_count = v.expected_rows THEN 'OK'
            WHEN c.row_count IS NULL THEN 'MISSING'
            ELSE 'MISMATCH'
        END
FROM dbo.vigie_ctrl v
LEFT JOIN dbo.synapse_rowcount_cache c
    ON  c.dataset = v.dataset
    AND c.periodicity = v.periodicity
    AND c.extraction_date = v.extraction_date
    AND c.layer = 'BRONZE'
WHERE v.ctrl_id = @ctrl_id;

UPDATE v
SET
    v.parquet_rows  = c.row_count,
    v.parquet_delta = c.row_count - v.expected_rows,
    v.parquet_status =
        CASE
            WHEN c.row_count = v.expected_rows THEN 'OK'
            WHEN c.row_count = 0 THEN 'EMPTY'
            WHEN c.row_count IS NULL THEN 'MISSING'
            ELSE 'KO'
        END
FROM dbo.vigie_ctrl v
LEFT JOIN dbo.synapse_rowcount_cache c
    ON  c.dataset = v.dataset
    AND c.periodicity = v.periodicity
    AND c.extraction_date = v.extraction_date
    AND c.layer = 'PARQUET'
WHERE v.ctrl_id = @ctrl_id;

UPDATE dbo.vigie_ctrl
SET synapse_start_ts = SYSUTCDATETIME()
WHERE ctrl_id = @ctrl_id
  AND synapse_start_ts IS NULL;

DECLARE @cost_per_min_cad decimal(10,6) = 0.002;  -- CAD / minute

UPDATE dbo.vigie_ctrl
SET
    synapse_cost_rate_cad_per_min = @cost_per_min_cad,
    synapse_cost_estimated_cad =
        ROUND((synapse_duration_sec / 60.0) * @cost_per_min_cad, 6)
WHERE ctrl_id = @ctrl_id
  AND synapse_duration_sec IS NOT NULL;

UPDATE dbo.vigie_ctrl
SET sla_bucket =
    CASE
        WHEN duration_sec IS NULL
          OR oeil_sla_expected_sec IS NULL
          OR oeil_sla_threshold_sec IS NULL
            THEN 'UNKNOWN'

        WHEN duration_sec <= oeil_sla_expected_sec
            THEN 'FAST'

        WHEN duration_sec <= oeil_sla_threshold_sec
            THEN 'SLOW'

        ELSE 'VERY_SLOW'
    END
WHERE ctrl_id = @ctrl_id;

UPDATE dbo.vigie_ctrl
SET volume_status =
    CASE
        WHEN expected_rows IS NULL
          OR expected_rows = 0
            THEN 'UNKNOWN'

        WHEN row_count_adf_ingestion_copie_parquet IS NULL
            THEN 'MISSING'

        WHEN ABS(row_count_adf_ingestion_copie_parquet - expected_rows) * 1.0 / expected_rows <= 0.05
            THEN 'OK'

        WHEN ABS(row_count_adf_ingestion_copie_parquet - expected_rows) * 1.0 / expected_rows <= 0.20
            THEN 'WARNING'

        ELSE 'ANOMALY'
    END
WHERE ctrl_id = @ctrl_id;

UPDATE dbo.ctrl_file_index
SET
  processed_flag = 1,
  processed_ts   = SYSUTCDATETIME()
WHERE ctrl_id = @ctrl_id;

UPDATE dbo.vigie_ctrl
SET
    /* =========================
       ALERT LEVEL
       ========================= */
    alert_level =
        CASE
            WHEN
                oeil_sla_status = 'FAIL'
                OR volume_status IN ('ANOMALY', 'LOW')
                OR adf_sla_status <> 'OK'
                OR synapse_sla_status <> 'OK'
            THEN 'CRITICAL'

            WHEN
                sla_bucket = 'VERY_SLOW'
                OR volume_status IN ('ANOMALY', 'LOW')
            THEN 'WARNING'

            WHEN
                sla_bucket = 'SLOW'
            THEN 'INFO'

            ELSE 'NO_ALERT'
        END,

    /* =========================
       ALERT FLAG
       ========================= */
    alert_flag =
        CASE
            WHEN
                oeil_sla_status = 'FAIL'
                OR volume_status IN ('ANOMALY', 'LOW')
                OR adf_sla_status <> 'OK'
                OR synapse_sla_status <> 'OK'
                OR sla_bucket IN ('SLOW', 'VERY_SLOW')
            THEN 1
            ELSE 0
        END,

    /* =========================
       ALERT REASON (EXPLICABLE)
       ========================= */
    alert_reason =
        CASE
            WHEN
                oeil_sla_status = 'FAIL'
                OR volume_status IN ('ANOMALY', 'LOW')
                OR adf_sla_status <> 'OK'
                OR synapse_sla_status <> 'OK'
            THEN
                CONCAT(
                    'OEIL=', oeil_sla_status,
                    ' | BUCKET=', sla_bucket,
                    ' | VOLUME=', COALESCE(volume_status, 'NA'),
                    ' | ADF=', COALESCE(adf_sla_status, 'NA'),
                    ' | SYNAPSE=', COALESCE(synapse_sla_status, 'NA')
                )

            WHEN
                sla_bucket IN ('SLOW', 'VERY_SLOW')
            THEN
                CONCAT(
                    'OEIL=', oeil_sla_status,
                    ' | BUCKET=', sla_bucket,
                    ' | VOLUME=', COALESCE(volume_status, 'OK')
                )

            ELSE
                'NO_ALERT'
        END,

    /* =========================
       ALERT TIMESTAMP
       ========================= */
    alert_ts =
        CASE
            WHEN
                oeil_sla_status = 'FAIL'
                OR volume_status IN ('ANOMALY', 'LOW')
                OR adf_sla_status <> 'OK'
                OR synapse_sla_status <> 'OK'
                OR sla_bucket IN ('SLOW', 'VERY_SLOW')
            THEN SYSUTCDATETIME()
            ELSE NULL
        END
WHERE ctrl_id = @ctrl_id;

UPDATE dbo.vigie_ctrl
SET alert_flag =
    CASE
        WHEN alert_level IN ('WARNING', 'CRITICAL') THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END
WHERE ctrl_id = @ctrl_id;
